error.database: Error while saving data to the database.
error.contact_devs: Please contact the developers if you believe this shouldn't happen.
error.profile_locked: Hey, I'm waiting for an operation to complete, please try again in some seconds.
error.cooldown_hit: Whoa calm down! You are typing commands too fast! ({0}s remaining)
error.embed: Error while trying to create embed. ${msg:error.contact_devs}
error.interact: I do not have the necessary permission to do this. (Role/Member interaction prohibited)

command.restricted: This command is restricted to {0} users only. Learn more at <https://notfab.net/LewdBot/Premium>
command.nsfw: That command will only work on NSFW channels, please mark the channel as NSFW (on channel settings) before using it. #BeCompliant

regex.number: That is not a valid number.
regex.boolean: That is not a valid boolean.
regex.url: That is not a valid URL.

search.text_none: No text channels were found with that name.
search.text_multiple: Multiple text channels found, please be more specific.
search.voice_none: No voice channels were found with that name.
search.voice_multiple: Multiple voice channels found, please be more specific.
search.role_none: No roles found with that name.
search.role_multiple: Multiple roles found, please be more specific.
search.member_none: No members found with that name.
search.member_multiple: Multiple members found, please be more specific.

error.not_enough: You don't have enough :cookie: to do this! (Required {0})
error.nothing: You do not have any cookies.

cookies.daily: +{0} :cookie:! Come back tomorrow to start your streak!
cookies.daily_streak: +{0} :cookie:! (Streak = {1}) Come back tomorrow for more cookies!
cookies.daily_already: You already received your daily cookies for today, try again in {0}.

faq.change_prefix: To change the prefix, either run `L!setup` or use `L!prefix {desired prefix}`
faq.how_use: You can use the bot by placing the default prefix before the command: `L!help`
faq.what_power: Power users are people who donated on Patreon. This restriction is in place due to CPU usage.
faq.change_volume: To change the volume, you need to be a Power user. If not, you can still right click the bot and use Discord's volume slider.
faq.how_nsfw: To use NSFW commands, make sure you are on a NSFW channel. The commands are: `L!r34` and `L!hentai` and `L!iac`.
faq.nsfw_bork: NSFW features are often broken due to their API. We are working on a fix. For now, try using `L!iac` instead.

language.hiring: We are looking for translators! Learn more at <https://notfab.net/LewdBot/Premium>

usage.default: Adds the specified role to yourself.
usage.purge: Removes all broken roles from the list.
usage.add: Adds a role to the list of available roles.
usage.remove: Removes a role from the list of available roles.

giveme.description: Allows users to add certain roles to themselves.
giveme.purged: All broken roles have been removed.
giveme.added: Role has been added to the GiveMe list.
giveme.removed: Role has been removed from the GiveMe list.
giveme.prohibited: That role name is not allowed because it's the same as a subcommand.
giveme.already: This role is already part of the GiveMe list.

usage.list: Lists all available badges with previews

badges.description: LewdBot Badges! Display custom badges on your profile. Earn them by completing their designated tasks.
badges.badge_beta: Awarded to those who helped test the badge system.
badges.translator: You are now a member of the LewdBot translation team.

autoplay.description: (Premium) Auto starts playing when a user joins the selected voice channel.
autoplay.enabled: Autoplay has been enabled, make sure to configure the voice channel.

usage.move_user: Moves a user to another voice channel
usage.move_channel: Moves all users in a voice channel to a different one

error.same_voice: Cannot move user to the same voice channel they are in.
error.member_not_connected: Target member is not connected to a voice channel

voice.description: Move multiple users between voice channels

error.no_permission_add: You do not have permission to add songs to the playlist.
error.no_voice_not_connected: You are not on a voice channel!
error.not_supported: This track source is not supported, try Youtube or SoundCloud instead!

music.description: Music commands (all these commands also work individually - `L!play` and `L!music play`)
music.volume_too_high: Too high. Please use a number between 5 and 150.
music.volume_too_low: Too low. Please use a number between 5 and 150.

usage.default: Makes LewdBot connect to your current voice channel.
usage.channel: Makes LewdBot connect to the specified channel.

error.failed_connect: Failed to connect to voice channel.
error.not_on_voice: You are not in a voice channel!

join.description: Connects LewdBot to a voice channel.

advertising.warning: Hey {User.Mention}, advertising is not allowed here.

error.nothing_to_delete: There are no items to delete!

prune.deleted_single: 1 Message deleted. This message will auto-destruct in 5 seconds.
prune.deleted_multiple: {0} Messages deleted. This message will auto-destruct in 5 seconds.

usage.get: Lists all permissions for a role
usage.reset: Resets all permissions for a role
usage.clear: Resets a permission for a role (back to original state)
usage.set: Sets a permission for a role with the given value

error.unknown_node: Unknown permission node, make sure you typed it correctly.

permissions.description: Manages LewdBot's permissions on a per-role basis.
permissions.role_reset: Permissions for the role {0} were reset.

usage.list: Lists all ignored channels (Where LewdBot will effectively be disabled).
usage.add: Adds a channel to the ignored list, making LewdBot stop working there.
usage.remove: Removes a channel from the ignored list.

error.same: Woha! You just tried to ignore this channel, that probably won't work out well. Try making a new one and ignoring this channel from there if that is _really_ what you want.
error.already: This channel is already being ignored.
error.not: This channel is not being ignored.

ignore.description: Ignores channels so LewdBot stops replying on them.
ignore.removed: Channel `{0}` is no longer being ignored.

usage.list: Lists all modules and their respective statuses.
usage.info: Gets the status of a specific module.

error.default: This is a default module and cannot be disabled.

module.description: Enable or disable sets of features

error.more_channel: More than one channel found with that name, would you like to retry? [Y/N]
error.no_channel: No channel found with that name, would you like to retry? [Y/N]

setup.description: Runs a setup to quickly get LewdBot ready for use.
setup.welcome:
Welcome to the LewdBot setup, please answer the following questions by simply replying in the chat (no prefix needed).
You can quit any time by simply typing `cancel`.
setup.setprefix: Would you like to define a custom prefix/trigger? [Y/N]
setup.typeprefix: Please type the new prefix to use (Note: `L!` and `@LewdBot` will always work):
setup.prefixchanged: Prefix changed, would you like to enable NSFW features? [Y/N]
setup.nsfw: Ok, would you like to enable NSFW features? [Y/N]
setup.nsfwenabled: NSFW Module enabled, would you like to set up a music channel?
setup.music: Ok, would you like to set up a music channel? [Y/N]
setup.musictag: Please tag the channel to send music statuses.

prefix.description: Changes LewdBot's prefix. (This does not disable L! and mention).

usages.name: Changes the game
usages.streamname: Changes the game and toggles streaming mode

error.no_embed: I don't have permission to send embeds here, so no command list for you.

help.description: Provides information on how to use the bot, along with a list of all available commands.
help.hello:
H-hello, I'm LewdBot, a multi-purpose discord bot, you can learn more about me here:
<https://github.com/Fabricio20/LewdWiki/wiki>

usages.search: Searches on IAC's collection for images tagged with the given terms.

error.no_load: If the image doesn't load, please click the title.

iateacrayon.description: Searches for NSFW images on IAteACrayon's collection.

usages.notag: Sends a random image from Rule34.
usages.search: Searches on Rule34 for images tagged with the given terms.

error.no_response: Error while retrieving images from Rule34 (Server returned empty response).
error.unknown: An unknown error happened while retrieving images from Rule34. Message: {0}

rule34.description: Searches for NSFW images on Rule34.xxx
rule34.search: {User.Name}'s search on Rule34. (Click here if Image doesn't Load)

usages.notag: Sends a random image from Danbooru.
usages.search: Searches on Danbooru for images tagged with the given terms.

error.no_response: Error while retrieving images from Danbooru (Server returned empty response).
error.unknown: An unknown error happened while retrieving images from Danbooru. Message: {0}

danbooru.description: Searches for NSFW images on Danbooru
danbooru.search: {User.Name}'s search on Danbooru. (Click here if Image doesn't Load)

usages.info: Shows information about the current guild.
usages.enable: Activates premium mode on the current guild.
usages.activate: Activates premium mode on the current guild using the given key.

error.all_keys_used: All your premium keys are already in use!
error.not_premium: You do not have any premium keys to use.
error.not_owner: You are not the owner of this key. Only the owner can activate it.

usages.role: Defines the role to give to members when they register.
usages.channel: Defines the channel where members have to type the magic word.
usages.word: Defines the magic word that members have to type.

error.public: Only the public (everyone) role was found, but all users already have that one.
error.permission: Error while adding role to member: No permission.

register.enabled: Registration system enabled. Please properly configure channel permissions.

cookie.description:
LewdBot Cookies! (Kind of a currency).
 More Info: https://goo.gl/2sXXyZ

usage.daily: Receives your daily cookies, do this every day for a streak bonus!
usage.vote: Vote for LewdBot daily and receive extra cookies!

cookie.vote_last: You last voted on {0}. You can vote at: <https://discordbots.org/bot/119482224713269248/vote>
cookie.vote_48: You voted in the past 48h, vote again to keep your streak! <https://discordbots.org/bot/119482224713269248/vote>
cookie.vote_24: You already voted today! Check again in {0}.
cookie.vote: Support LewdBot and Receive Cookies every day! Vote at <https://discordbots.org/bot/119482224713269248/vote>
cookie.vote_thanks: Thanks for voting! You received +{0} :cookie: (Vote every day for as streak!)

usages.set: Changes the welcome message to the informed message.
usages.dms: Defines if the message should be sent in DMs instead.

welcome.description: System for welcoming users (Sends a message to the user / in chat upon join).

usages.add_name: Adds a song by name (searches on YouTube).
usages.add_url: Adds a song by URL (Youtube or SoundCloud).
usages.clear: Clears the current/active playlist of songs.
usages.join: Connects to your current voice channel.
usages.join_name: Connects to the given voice channel.
usages.play: Starts playing the next song in the playlist.
usages.play_name: Starts playing a track by name (If not found searches on Youtube and adds).
usages.play_pos: Starts playing a track by it's position on the playlist.
usages.play_url: Starts playing a track by URL, adding if needed.
usages.play_radio: Starts playing the specified live radio, adding if needed.
usages.remove_pos: Removes a track by it's position on the playlist.
usages.setmusic: Defines the channel where LewdBot sends music-related messages to.

error.no_playlist_found: No playlist found with that name (or ID).
error.too_many_playlists: Too many playlists found, please be more specific.
error.no_room: You cannot create more playlists, please remove some or upgrade to Premium to create more.
error.track_already_present: This track is already in the playlist.
error.track_not_present: This track does not exist in the current playlist.

descriptions.add: Adds a track or stream to the active playlist.
descriptions.join: Joins your voice channel or a specified one.
descriptions.npl: Displays what is currently playing on the bot.
descriptions.play: Starts playing the given track, or skips to the next one.
descriptions.remove: Removes tracks from the active playlist.
descriptions.setmusic: Defines the channel where LewdBot will send music info.
descriptions.stop: Makes LewdBot stop playing and disconnect.
descriptions.volume: Changes the volume of the bot.

usage.seconds: Enables slowmode in the channel with the specified seconds as delay. 0 to disable.

slowmode.description: Twitch-like slowmode for Discord (Now using Discord's slowmode feature)
